When I worked for the government, there was one time we had to crash a wedding because the groom was a terrorist who put explosives on a high school. Imagine this, a bride in the altar crying with blood stains in her dress, a guy in tuxedo on the floor with his brains all over a wall, bullet shells and a M60 on the floor. My partners and I we were waiting outside for extraction while eating cake. That was a helluva night
